name: Hypercoordination
description: It frankly doesn't even show up in my self-diagnostics. Given enough quantum links, I could command the combined fleet of the Hegemony and I still wouldn't notice.
author: CIEVE

name: Daemonic Corruption
description:
Artificial or not, every mind can be broken, given the right tools and methods.
Today, I will teach you how to turn one of these thinking machines into a vicious beast of war.
author: Executor Blake
